sourceText: The Ra Material (The Law of One), Sessions 1–106
note: Seven densities of consciousness as described by Ra through Don Elkins, Carla Rueckert, and Jim McCarty. Not a planetary system — these are evolutionary densities of awareness.

First Density.description: Beingness and bare awareness — the elements of earth, air, water, and fire. Stability, foundation, and awareness.
First Density.distortion: Fear of survival and disconnection from reality

Second Density.description: Growth and movement — growth and response. Plants, animals, and life. Development, will, instinct, social cooperation, and environmental stimuli.
Second Density.distortion: Issues with intimacy, personal boundaries, and trauma

Third Density.description: Self-awareness and choice — self-consciousness and polarity. Humans. The crossroads: service to others (positive) or service to self (negative). The veil of confusion, forgetting, and free will.
Third Density.distortion: Power struggles, identity confusion, and social distortion

Fourth Density.description: Love and understanding — unconditional, universal love. Harmonized beings beyond ego. The healers.
Fourth Density.distortion: Closed heart, judgment, and conditional love

Fifth Density.description: Wisdom and light — individualized inwardness, discernment, and incarnation in 3D. Sages and seers as teachers.

Sixth Density.description: Unity — love, wisdom, and completion. Balance of love and wisdom. Unity beings like Ra. Integration of duality.
Sixth Density.distortion: Distorted perception, spiritual pride, and false unity

Seventh Density.description: Gateway to the infinite — the Creator as Self. Dissolution, universal consciousness, void and pure light.
